prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Wythe House Map and General Information, Manuscript #MS 1996.53 20C, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The George Wythe House, one of the original buildings of Colonial Williamsburg, was restored and opened to the public in 1940.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Contains Map and General Information leaflet (1946) and an additional brochure (undated) regarding the George Wythe House.
